title.rendered: UK Scholarships for Pakistani Students in Top Universities

content.rendered:
Studying in the UK is a great opportunity; however, it’s not easy for everyone. The fee structure is expensive compared to Pakistani universities, and high living costs are another hurdle. Therefore, most students search for scholarships to manage their expenses and tuition fees. However, UK scholarships for Pakistani students, specifically fully funded, are not easy to grab. However, many other scholarships can help students manage their tuition costs.

If you are seeking fully funded scholarships for Pakistani students in the UK, then remember that you must be exceptional in academic history. Nonetheless, let’s skip the chit-chat and explore some of the best scholarships for students who want to study abroad. Let’s learn their criteria and requirements in detail.

Table of Contents

Toggle
  • Popular UK Scholarships for Pakistani Students
    • Great Scholarships
      • Participating UK Universities
    • Chevening Scholarship
    • Common Wealth Scholarship and Fellowship Plan

    • Gates Cambridge Scholarship
  • Scholarship Offered by Universities
    • 1. Oxford-Weidenfeld and Hoffmann Scholarships
    • 2. University of Manchester Global Futures Scholarship
    • 3. University of Warwick Chancellor’s International Scholarship
  • Private UK Scholarships for Pakistani Students
    • 1. Dawood Foundation Scholarship
    • 2. British Council Charles Wallace Scholarship
    • 3. Commonwealth Shared Scholarship Program
  • Partial UK Scholarships for Pakistani Students
  • Advantages of UK Scholarships for Pakistani Students
    • Less Expenses:
    • Better Career Opportunities:
    • Personal Growth:
    • Connection and Professional Growth:
  • How to Get a UK Scholarship from Pakistan?

Popular UK Scholarships for Pakistani Students

EduCrest Migration helps undergraduate and postgraduate students from Pakistan to earn scholarships and benefits for studying in the UK. With a list of hundreds of universities offering scholarships for Pakistani students, we help you study abroad without worrying about tuition expenses. We use our online resources and university partnership opportunities to provide scholarships for all deserving students. Here’s a list of some popular scholarships for Pakistani students:

Great Scholarships

An excellent scholarship can be beneficial if you have an undergraduate degree and want to continue your education in the UK. You can earn up to a £10,000 scholarship on tuition fees for a one-year-taught post-graduate program. The UK government’s GREAT Britain Campaign funds this scholarship with partner UK universities.

Participating UK Universities

The post-graduate scholarships are available for Pakistani students in the following universities:

  1. Anglia Ruskin University
  2. Aston University
  3. Cardiff University
  4. Durham University
  5. Keele University
  6. Imperial College London
  7. Lancaster University
  8. University of Manchester
  9. Teesside University
  10. University of Glasgow
  11. University of Nottingham
  12. Royal College of Art
  13. And Seven others.

Chevening Scholarship

Another scholarship is offered by the UK Foreign, Commonwealth, and Development Office. This scholarship covers the full, fully funded UK scholarship for Pakistani students and the full tuition fee. Moreover, it also offers a monthly living allowance and return airfare of economy class. Besides, it also provides the cost of one visa application and a travel grant to participate in Chevening events in the UK. The student must show leadership qualities, an impressive academic background, experience, and a positive attitude.

Common Wealth Scholarship and Fellowship Plan

The UK’s CSC (Commonwealth Scholarship Commission) has funded over 30,000 Pakistani students since 1960. These scholarships are given to students with high potential to bring a positive change globally. If you have the potential to bring a change in the world, then you can also join this scholarship program. However, you must have a bachelor’s degree (2:1) to meet the requirements for the program.

Rhodes Scholarship

The Rhodes Scholarship is also a fully funded scholarship for Pakistani students in the UK. Rhodes Trust offers this program and covers student’s tuition fees, living costs, and travel costs. As a Pakistani student, you should have a bachelor’s degree to get that scholarship. The age limit is between 19 to 25 years. Again, this scholarship also demands academic excellence and the potential to change the world positively.

Gates Cambridge Scholarship

The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation offers the Gates Cambridge Scholarship. This UK scholarship for Pakistani students covers the full tuition fee, living expenses, airfare, and many other benefits. Like the above scholarship programs, this program is also for PhD and Master’s programs. Pakistani students must have academic excellence and potential leadership qualities.

Scholarship Offered by Universities

Many universities in the UK offer fully-funded scholarships for Pakistani students. They convert different expenses from tuition fees to living costs. Here are some popular UK scholarships for Pakistani students provided by universities:

1. Oxford-Weidenfeld and Hoffmann Scholarships

    The Oxford-Weidenfeld and Hoffmann Scholarships cover Pakistani students’ tuition fees and living expenses. They help the students study a full-time master’s degree at Oxford University. In addition to the university fee, the scholarship covers other costs, including travelling expenses. Besides, the students can also develop professionally by attending seminars and networking events.

    2. University of Manchester Global Futures Scholarship

      The University of Manchester also offers scholarships for Pakistani students to study in the UK. Its Global Futures Scholarship is for those who want to pursue a postgraduate degree. As a fully funded scholarship program, it covers tuition fees and living expenses of the students. This scholarship is for students who have impressive academic histories and the potential to be leaders.

      3. University of Warwick Chancellor’s International Scholarship

        If you seek a master’s degree in the UK, this scholarship is for you. University of Warwick Chancellor’s International Scholarship is for students who are exceptional in their academics and possess leadership qualities. You can have up to £10,000 for one educational year.

        Private UK Scholarships for Pakistani Students

        Other than the above scholarships for Pakistani students abroad, some private scholarships are also available. These are not from the universities or institutes available in the UK but are locally funded. Here are some popular scholarships you can go for:

        1. Dawood Foundation Scholarship

          If you want to study at the University of Cambridge, the Dawood Foundation Scholarship is for you. TDF supports education in science, technology, and research areas. This organization offers you an annual living allowance of £15,000 other than tuition fees.

          2. British Council Charles Wallace Scholarship

            British Council Charles Wallace Scholarship is for Pakistani students who want to pursue a Master’s degree in the UK. It covers fees up to £18000 GBP, living expenditures up to £15000, and flight and research expenses up to £2000 and £4000, respectively. Moreover, Pakistani students also get training about the UK’s culture and how to live there.

            3. Commonwealth Shared Scholarship Program

              The Commonwealth Shared Scholarship is for students who want to pursue a postgraduate degree in the UK. Your country must be listed with the Commonwealth Scholarship Commission UK. The scholarship lasts 12 months and is for those who have the potential to bring about positive change. It includes more than 26 master’s and 30 PhD programs. This scholarship covers Pakistani students’ tuition fees and travel and living costs.

              Partial UK Scholarships for Pakistani Students

              Other than fully funded scholarships, which need academic excellence, you can save bucks on partial scholarships. Many universities in the UK offer scholarships at the issuance of offer letters. Here’s is the list of universities you can apply to and achieve a particular discount on fees:

              Advantages of UK Scholarships for Pakistani Students

              No denial of getting international scholarships only benefits us. They help us focus on our careers rather than panicking about meeting tuition and living expenses. Here are some notable benefits you grab while getting UK scholarships:

              Less Expenses:

              Whether wholly or partially funded, scholarships can help you reduce your expenses. Most of them cover your tuition fees and living expenses, so you can only focus on your education. Pakistani students are hardworking, and when they get the right opportunity, they should not fall behind just because of expenses. So, scholarships relieve the worry of academic and living expenses in the UK for Pakistani students.

              Better Career Opportunities:

              You can focus on your education and career when you don’t have to worry about tuition and living expenses. With that, Pakistani students can excel academically and make a name for themselves. Better exposure and field experience also offer them better career opportunities.

              Personal Growth:

              Studying in the UK offers students both personal and professional growth. They get to experience a new culture and grow their personality. This enhances their communication skills and gives them the confidence to do better. Moreover, when they return to Pakistan after studying in the UK, they can bring a positive change.

              Connection and Professional Growth:

              When you study in the UK, you meet students from different countries, especially UK locals. Befriending them and making connections can help you in your career later on. For example, you can start a business or find better job opportunities.

              How to Get a UK Scholarship from Pakistan?

              To get a scholarship for study in the UK from Pakistan, you need to follow some steps. However, it’s best to remember that thousands like you will remember that thousands like you will be fighting for that particular scholarship. Trying is the key to success. However, with the proper study in UK consultants like EduCrest Migration, you can still achieve guaranteed partial scholarships from different UK universities. Here are the steps you can follow to apply individually:

              1. Search for the websites of the sources providing scholarships (universities or institutions).
              2. Explore their scholarship sections. You can find universities universities under admission or international student sections. Look for the deadlines.
              3. Now, look for the requirements and details, such as eligibility, process, and deadlines.
              4. Complete all the requirements and procedures and provide all the necessary details, including documentation.
              5. After completing the application processing steps, submit your application and wait for the response from the respective institution.
              6. The university will provide more details if you get the scholarship to study in the UK.

              Want to study in the UK? Learn more details from here: Click Here. Need assistance with your UK university admission or Visa processing? Contact our expert education consultants in Islamabad, Pakistan.
